author: Kan Ting Chiu J:
casename: Husain Safdar Abidally v Shiraz Abidally Husain alias Shiraz Abidally Abdul Husain and Another
counsel: Gopalan Raman (G Raman & Partners) for the plaintiff; Mirza Namazie and Chua Boon Beng (Mallal & Namazie) for the defendants; Pillay Mohan Reviendran (Wong Partnership) for the second defendant in her personal capacity
tags-parsed: Muslim Law/Agreement between children of deceased Muslim man to honour deceased's wish to distribute part of his estate in equal shares between them/Whether agreement binding
